title: Song of the Wood Thrush
credit_line: Bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Charles E. Burchfield [1893-1967], West Seneca, NY; Frank K. M. Rehn, Inc., New York, NY by 1951 [1]; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, 1951 until February 14, 1987; Mrs. James H. Beal, Pittsburgh, PA, until April 23, 1993; bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1994.

Notes:
[1]. See "The Beal Collection of American Art," Carnegie Museum of Art, 1994, p. 80.

creator.death_place: West Seneca (Erie county, New York state, United States)
